title: (x) One Kick's Gym - City {Patty}
content:
Happpy Fathers Day to those it applies to.

Needing help with another. I have something similar but I have no idea where I got it. Its called Village Square, but if I search for it I cant find its family. If you have any ideas and can steer me to the correct family, I’d appreciate it. What I have is regular and I really need bold... or ideas on what the actual font is.

Usually I can find a font family with no troubles. If I aquired something down the line that isnt legit I’d like to know so I can pitch it.

Thanks

Jill
